src

Class WeightedRandomizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.WeightedRandomizer

  • public class WeightedRandomizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows for flexible weighted randomization
    Author:
    Nate Young

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WeightedRandomizer()
      Default Constructor: creates a new empty WeightedRandomizer instance
      WeightedRandomizer(double... weights)
      Constructs a new WeightedRandomizer instance given an arbitrary number of double weights
      WeightedRandomizer(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> weights)
      Constructs a new WeightedRandomizer instance given a list of weights

      Appends a new weight to the list of weights
      double get(int index)
      Returns a weight at a specific index
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      int pickIndex()
      Picks a random index out of however many this instance contains, taking weights into account.
      void set(int index, double weight)
      Sets the weight at the given index to the given value
      int size()
      Returns the number of indices/weights in this WeightedRandomizer instance

      Returns the sum of all the weights of the different indices

        public WeightedRandomizer(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> weights)
        Constructs a new WeightedRandomizer instance given a list of weights
        Parameters:
        weights - The list of weights for the various choices that the randomizer will choose between.

        Constructs a new WeightedRandomizer instance given an arbitrary number of double weights

        public void set(int index,

      • sum

        public double sum()
        Returns the sum of all the weights of the different indices
        Returns:
        The sum of all of the weights

      • pickIndex

        public int pickIndex()
        Picks a random index out of however many this instance contains, taking weights into account.
        Returns:
        A random index (0...size()-1) after taking weights into account
